name: create-adr
description: Create a new Architecture Decision Record (ADR) following our template

arguments.name: topic
arguments.description: The architectural decision topic or title

content.text:
Please help me create a new Architecture Decision Record (ADR) for the following topic:

# Decision Topic

{{topic}}

# ADR Template and Examples

Here is our ADR template and example ADRs to follow:

{{resource:architecture://adr/adr-template}}

{{resource:architecture://adr/adr-example}}

{{resource:architecture://adr/001-microservices-architecture}}

# Instructions

Please create a draft ADR that:
1. Follows the structure defined in our ADR template
2. Includes all required sections: Title, Status, Context, Decision, Consequences
3. Uses a similar style and level of detail as the example ADRs
4. Provides a clear and concise explanation of the decision
5. Considers both positive and negative consequences
6. Uses appropriate technical language and terminology

The ADR should be ready to save as a markdown file with minimal editing. Include a suggested filename in the format `NNN-kebab-case-title.md` where NNN is the next available number.
